location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5119/46 'Mr Weightman, Secretary to the Government of India in the External Affairs Department: deputation to the UK 1946; personal telegrams; leave 1947'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 28; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to the travel arrangements of Sir Hugh Weightman (Secretary to the Government of India, External Affairs Department) for three separate trips, including information on accommodation and expenses.

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
